mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_no, c.username, c.pno, c.pqty, c.price, p.pno, p.pimage, p.pname, p.price FROM scart c, sproduct p, suser u WHERE p.pno = c.pno AND c.username = #{c.username} AND u.username = c.username
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO scart(username, pno, pqty, price) VALUES(#{username}, #{pno}, #{pqty}, #{price})
